sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' export default class MDXContent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.layout = null } render() { const { components, ...props } = this.props return {`searchModules()`} {`Search KRATOS_PATH for types and modules`} {`Kind`}{`: global function`} {`removeModule()`} {`Delete module from kratos`} {`Kind`}{`: global function`} {`syncModules()`} {`Check if modules are out of sync`} {`Kind`}{`: global function`} {`recursiveInstall(kratosJson, `}{`[base]`}{`)`} {`Recusively search and install kratos.json deps`} {`Kind`}{`: global function `} {`Param`} {`Type`} {`Default`} {`Description`} {`kratosJson`} {`*`} {`kratos.json file as object`} {`[base]`} {`boolean`} {`false`} {`Define whether this is the base kratos.json file`} {`gitInit(modulePath, slug, tag)`} {`Handle all git local and remote details and installs`} {`Kind`}{`: global function `} {`Param`} {`Type`} {`Description`} {`modulePath`} {`*`} {`Path to .git folder`} {`slug`} {`*`} {`Slug to use for remote git`} {`tag`} {`*`} {`Tag version to push to remote`} {`deployModule()`} {`Deploy a new module to KRATOS_PATH`} {`Kind`}{`: global function `} {`pushModule()`} {`Deploy a new module to KRATOS_PATH`} {`Kind`}{`: global function `} {`bumpVersion()`} {`Bump a package version`} {`Kind`}{`: global function `} } }
